Attributes.description: An activity-focused course providing the opportunity to study and practice forms of writing needed in business.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of ENGL 112, ASTU 150, WRDS 150, ENGL 100, ENGL 120, ENGL 121. (ENGL 1st, Arts One, a minimum of 18 cr. of Coordinated Arts Program.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 17:00, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
